statements.comment: Blazedpath already logs all 500 errors. This condition is to log the other code errors

children.expression:
{ 
	errCode: err.code,
	errMessage: err["message"],
    errStack: err["stack"],
    errRaw: err.raw,
    errorData: err.data,
    errInnerError: err.innerError,
    errInnerErrorMessage: err.innerError["message"],
    errInnerErrorStack: err.innerError["stack"],
    httpRequest: httpRequest, 
    httpResponse: httpResponse
}
